advancements.theurgy.root.description: The journey towards uncovering the mysteries of the universe lies ahead.
advancements.theurgy.root.title: Theurgy
block.theurgy.grafting_hedge.grafted.too: When ripe the fruit can be seen hanging in the hedge.
Right-click to harvest the fruit when ripe.
block.theurgy.grafting_hedge.tooltip: Grafting hedges can grow any type of fruit.
block.theurgy.grafting_hedge.tooltip.ext: When ripe the fruit can be seen hanging in the hedge.
block.theurgy.grafting_hedge.tooltip.usa: Right-click with a fruit to a hedge to graft it onto the plant. It will then grow that kind of fruit.
item.theurgy.theurgy.tooltip: Dummy item for easy access to the Theurgy icon.
